Articles.Content:
I'm creating a few custom parts and i've been looking around for info on ModuleGenerator and i can't seem to find a guide like i can with other modules.

Does anyone know of anywhere where all the parameters are listed?

Thanks

did you look at http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/ModuleGenerator ?

what did you want know else?

variable names from Modulegenerator in Code:

efficiency - didn't know how this works

generatorIsActive

isThrottleControlled

resourceThreshold - didn't know what this

throttle

maybe someone else know what these variable do exactly

I have the parameter "requiresAllinputs = true" which means the generator is only active provided their is sufficient input resources.

However, i wanted to know if their is a parameter that will stop the generator if the output resources are full.

Basically, i'm adding some parts to my KPS to do things that the stock game doesn't have that i think it should. But, while their is quite a bit of documentation on CFG files but it seems to be a little light on some of the model options.

Edit:

requiresAllinputs isn't listed on that wiki page...
